frontMatter.title: 笔记应用 joplin
frontMatter.summary: an open source note taking and to-do application with synchronisation capabilities for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android and iOS.

prev.title: 一个介绍 PyTorch 的playlist
prev.summary: 发现一个介绍 PyTorch 的playlist，动画效果属实不错，缺点是废话有点多。。建议1.25或1.5倍速

next.title: The Big List of Naughty Strings
next.summary: The Big List of Naughty Strings is a list of strings which have a high probability of causing issues when used as user-input data.
